subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers are 5-2 since losing point guard Chris Paul, and Blake Griffin, a 6-foot-10 power forward, has assumed a big part of Paul’s playmaking duties.
snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers are 5-2 since losing point guard Chris Paul, and Blake Griffin, a 6-foot-10 power forward, has assumed a big part of Paul’s playmaking duties.
